One plus offset of last byte to draw.

member.name: P:HexControl.DataSelectionEventArgs.Range
member.summary:
If a complete range (or some of its bytes) is selected this property will return this range otherwise it will return null.
Note that if selection data overlaps ranges this property will be null.
